author: Bart

review: We moved from a house with 13 Mbps internet to one with 7 Mbps and my old Roku took forever to buffer and kept pausing during movies to buffer again.  I am a big fan of all things Amazon so bought the Fire TV.  I can't believe how fast the menus and the movies load.  I thought the voice command feature, based on the movie star commercial, was a farce, but no -- love the ability to say the name of a movie and to go right to it.  Then I saw where I can play Tetris on the Fire TV, how much fun will that be?  I haven't used any recent competing products but don't see how one could go wrong with a Fire TV.

review: Just tell it what you want and it almost gives it to you.  It will give a list that matches and you select which is best.  However, your selection will only be for the first instance!  For a tv series, that means season one.  Other seasons will require searching like regular on the remote, one button at a time.  For movies and actors, it works fine.  It has limited games offered;  and who would listen to music on tv?My fire box hd does not turn on when I press any button on the remote.  I always have to cycle power.  At least it boots quickly.
